name: Grapher Template
summary: Learn about .GRT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GRT files enable users to create graphs (.GPJ or .GRF files) that have a consistent look and feel. The graphs are commonly used for presentations and technical publications.

description: File created by Grapher 2D and 3D graphing software; saves a graph template, which specifies predefined settings for generating a graph; may include the graph type, axis labels, colors, layout formatting, and other settings.
